fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Each night, bring someone a dream.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- One of the following effects will happen:
Make them the cutest that they’ve ever seen. They’ll be roleblocked tonight
Give them two lips, like roses and clover. Your target will be redirected to another player at random
Tell them that their lonesome nights are over. Visitors to your target will have roleblock and redirect immunity

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Turn on your magic beam and eliminate all who mean to harm the town (town goal).
